body.description: Support your feminine health using probiotics for women in a more complete way with vH essentials Probiotics with Prebiotics and Cranberry Feminine Health Supplement Capsules. The triple-action prebiotic supplements bolster both feminine tract and urinary tract health. These probiotics for vaginal health include LactoSpore (probiotics), fructo-oligosaccharides (prebiotics), and natural cranberry powder. Formulated with prebiotics and probiotics, this dietary vaginal health probiotic supplement helps nourish existing good bacteria. Additionally, the clinically studied feminine products promote urinary health.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Customer for Life
reviews.reviewText: I found this product in CVS a couple of years ago and was drawn in by the added cranberry and ridiculously reasonable price point compared to the other probiotics. I also remember purchasing and really liking the feminine wash by this brand and thought I’d give the probiotic a shot. I got out of using it regularly then but about a month ago returned to daily use. All I can say is it definitely works as well as I remember. I usually like to try out different brands of supplements before I commit to one but I am certain this will be my go to moving forward.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and actually works/helps
reviews.reviewText: If you struggle with unnatural odor that is a little off putting and concerns you then this is definitely the pill for you. You do have to be consistent with them for your first bottle but after you don’t have to take them daily. Always make sure that you are healthy before self diagnosing anything!! These pills, boric acid pills, and the matching soap are a must have if you want to get into health for her without going through trial and error. Remember she is supposed to have a smell that is unique to you but if you think there may be an actual problem schedule that appointment! The pills go down easily and don’t have unnecessary flavors if that is something you worry about.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must Have Feminine Health Supplement
reviews.reviewText: I recently incorporated vH essentials Probiotics with Prebiotics and Cranberry into my daily routine, and the results have been nothing short of impressive. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars HONEST REVIEW!! THESE REALLY WORK!!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased based off all the positive comments and Reviews…My ph balance was off set. When I got them in mail I immediately took 2. Taking two right off hand gave me a really bad stomach ache. the next day I decided to take 1 in morning and one at night. You can take up to 2 a day anyway. Well, The first day I didn’t see a difference, second day I didn’t see a difference, by the 3 day evening is when I noticed a difference. I also used the VH BODY WASH…I do like it very much! Women who suffer from odor, sweating or irritation this stuff is a game changer. I was using suppositories but I want something a bit more on the safer side. THIS REALLY DOES WORK AND IM GLAD THAT I PURCHASED THIS AND DID MY RESEARCH! This stuff will change someone’s life. BUY YOU WONT REGRET!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn't work for me
reviews.reviewText: I used up the whole bottle and didn't notice anything. I still have an odor. I have some constipation as well. I thought it would help with constipation but it has not. I like the pill size and I don't notice a taste to it. I like that you only need to take two pills a day but I'm disappointed that it did not work for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Equal to acidophilus
reviews.reviewText: My oh balance has always been an issue I use to take a tablespoon of acidophilus to keep it balanced until I started using these I used them for about 2 years .. it’s been 5 years since I stopped taking be sise I no longer was having the issue of it didn’t work for other Probally because they had a different or more severe issue I highly recommend this
El producto me gustó, queria volver a comprar pero el vendedor subió el precio al doble, por la cantidad no se me hace justo el precio.

reviews.reviewTitle: Pathetic and useless medicine and seller.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this medicine with high hopes, but unfortunately for me and ridiculously on their part, they have not printed the manufacture date and expiry date anywhere on the box nor the medicine dabba itself. I contacted the seller, who asked me to contact the manufacturer directly who is in US and so i am unable to do anything as i don't have the time or energy to do all this at midnight. The seller is useless and the medicine too, because no one is ready to use a medicine or supplement without knowing when it will expire. Since this medicine is very very expensive, i am unable to return it and all my money is now wasted. Worst product in this respect and no one should ever buy anything anymore from this seller who has refused to give me any constructive solution. Pathetic they are.

I was a bit hesitant initially in buying this but the write up convinced me. Am I glad I bought it. Just a few days after taking this, the normal secretion with a bit funky smell I have is gone and I feel that it helped with my overall health down there. Really good and just about to buy my new set of supplies. Recommended!!!

This product seems fabulous.I’ve had intermittent BV for years.Recently the discharge and awful smell were back and really obvious to me. I could smell it when I was sitting down. Distressing.I’m 56, not sexually active or in a relationship for several years. I wouldn’t have wanted to be in any relationship. I came across these whilst searching for cranberry tablets and thought it was worth a try.24 hours later, smell and discharge reduced and a week later has completely settled.It’s worth a try if you get BV. Don’t suffer.Unless you’ve suffered with BV, it’s hard to understand how awful it can be.
